messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] question for all
messages.msgSnippet: There s an anime Toshizo Hijikata, shiru no kiseki , actually it s about Hijikata Toshizo but it tells about Shinsengumi too. It s in Japanese - no English
messages.messageBody:
There's an anime "Toshizo Hijikata, shiru no kiseki", actually it's about Hijikata Toshizo but it tells about Shinsengumi too. It's in Japanese - no English subtitles. You can find it in www.yesasia.com or www.toshizohijikata.com

Good luck. NaZ

Marshall lilly <blinkboy999@...> wrote:

hey guys,


im a junior at the university of dallas and i am lookin for information on
the wolves of mibu (shinsengumi) Any information would greatly help me in my
school project. THANKS GUYS..

okita

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] question for all
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I have this Dvd: Tennen Rishin Ryu This is the tecnic that the shinsen Gumi used. http://budogu.com/shopsite_sc/store/html/product610.html The material
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I have this Dvd: Tennen Rishin Ryu

This is the tecnic that the shinsen Gumi used.

http://budogu.com/shopsite_sc/store/html/product610.html

The material is interesting since the historical point of view. Unfortunatelly I have not more info about Shinsen Gumi, just the reference in Rurouni Kenshin :)

Good luck!


Helly

messages.subject: Samurai Fiction 2005 WINNER
messages.msgSnippet: AND THE WINNER IS: NinaTwo (Nevermore) AKA NinaBoal21044 s story STRAY DOGS: http://www.samurai-archives.com/sdg.html And an honorable mention goes to
messages.messageBody:
AND THE WINNER IS:

NinaTwo (Nevermore) AKA NinaBoal21044's story STRAY DOGS:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sdg.html

And an honorable mention goes to Nagaeyari for SAKURADAMONGAI NO HEN:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/snh.html

I will be linking these as well as the other entries to a section in
the "featured articles" section of the Samurai Archives within a day.

Congratulations all!
